players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Let's work together to solve this case. I am innocent, but I know the mafioso killed Alice last night. We need to find out who else might be involved."
Diana: "Bob, I believe Charlie is the mafioso. We should lynch them."
You: "Charlie is innocent, I trust him. We should focus on finding the real mafioso."
